apply_discount_code: Apply a promotional or discount code to the order or cart.
remove_discount_code: Remove or deactivate a previously applied discount/promo code from the order.
check_cart_items: Verify the list of items currently in the shopping cart and their quantities.
check_wishlist: Retrieve or view items saved in the user’s wishlist.
add_to_wishlist: Add a product to the user’s wishlist or favourites list.
remove_from_wishlist: Remove a product from the user’s wishlist or favourites list.
share_wishlist: Share the wishlist with another user or via link/email.
gift_wrap_option: Request or inquire about the gift-wrapping option for an order.
schedule_delivery: Schedule or change the delivery date/time for an order.
change_delivery_address: Update the delivery/shipping address for an existing order.
split_order_items: Split order items into multiple shipments or delivery dates.
combine_orders: Combine multiple orders or shipments into one delivery.
checkout_guest: Proceed to checkout as a guest (without account login).
checkout_saved_address: Use a previously saved address for checkout or change default address.
select_payment_plan: Choose a payment instalment or payment-plan option (e.g., 0% interest instalments).
apply_store_credit: Use existing store credit, gift card, or account credit toward purchase.
inquire_gift_card_balance: Check the available balance on a gift card or account credit.
redeem_gift_card: Redeem a gift card or voucher toward purchase.
report_missing_coupon: Report or query a missing coupon discount that should have been applied.
product_recommendation_request: Ask for personalized product recommendations based on preferences or history.
compare_products: Request side-by-side comparison of two or more products (features, price, reviews).
check_product_reviews: View customer reviews or ratings of a specific product.
submit_product_review: Submit a review or rating for a purchased product.
request_size_chart: Ask for the size/fit chart information for apparel or footwear items.
check_product_material_info: Inquire about product material/composition (e.g., fabric, metal type).
check_backorder_status: Ask if a currently out-of-stock item is on backorder and when it may ship.
notify_when_available: Sign up for a notification when a product becomes available/in stock again.
request_bulk_pricing: Inquire about bulk-purchase pricing or wholesale discount for multiple items.
request_product_bundle: Ask about available product bundles or multipacks promotions.
gift_message_request: Add or edit a gift message for an order to be sent to recipient.
track_return_status: Track the status of a returned product or refund process.
cancel_return_request: Cancel a previously initiated return request before processing.
exchange_out_of_store: Request exchange of a product via an alternate channel (e.g., via mail when store exchange not possible).
request_restock_date: Ask when a specific product will be restocked or released again.
preorder_product: Pre-order an upcoming product not yet released or shipped.
cancel_preorder: Cancel a previously placed pre-order before release/shipment.
price_drop_alert_setup: Set up an alert for when the price of a product drops below a certain threshold.
price_match_request: Request a price match guarantee or price adjustment after purchase if price drops.
loyalty_points_balance_query: Check the balance of loyalty/reward points in the user’s account.
redeem_loyalty_points: Redeem loyalty/reward points for products, discounts or offers.
tier_membership_upgrade: Ask about upgrading membership tier in a loyalty program (e.g., gold to platinum).
subscription_cancel: Cancel a subscription service tied to product deliveries (e.g., monthly box).
subscription_resume: Resume a previously paused subscription service.
subscribe_to_newsletter: Subscribe the user email to the store’s promotional newsletter.
unsubscribe_from_newsletter: Unsubscribe the user email from the store’s promotional newsletter.
opt_in_sms_alerts: Opt-in to SMS/promotional alerts from the e-commerce platform.
opt_out_sms_alerts: Opt-out of SMS/promotional alerts from the e-commerce platform.
request_order_invoice_pdf: Request the PDF invoice of a completed order.
request_custom_engraving: Ask for custom engraving, monogramming, or personalization of a product.
check_warranty_coverage: Check warranty coverage or extended warranty status for a product.
